author: vines
msg: ACCUMULO-19 - readlink doesn't have a flag for -f on OSX. Hopefully nobody is chaining symlinks.

author: sf
msg: Initialize EC temporary key on server startup, as for DH and
RSA. This fixes a race condition that could lead to a crash with threaded

author: hwright
msg: (read_handler_gz, write_handler_gz): Down-cast a integer variable, since we
can't change the target type, because it is defined by an external library.

author: markrmiller
msg: don't replicate conf files in solrcloud mode - we don't have access to the raw fs conf dir
